name: HSP_ACCT_PX_LIST
description: This table contains hospital account final procedure list information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The ID number of a hospital account.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number in the results of a query. Since multiple coded procedures can be stored in one hospital account, each procedure will have a unique line number.

columns.name: FINAL_ICD_PX_ID
columns.description: A coded procedure stored in the hospital account.

columns.name: FINAL_ICD_PX_ID_ICD_PX_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ICD procedure record.

columns.name: PROC_DATE
columns.description: The date associated with a coded procedure stored in the hospital account.

columns.name: PROC_PERF_PROV_ID
columns.description: The ID of the performing provider associated with a coded procedure stored in the hospital account.

columns.name: PROC_EVENT_NUMBER
columns.description: The event number associated with a coded procedure stored in the hospital account. Event numbers are used to associate coded procedures with CPTï¿½ codes.

columns.name: PX_AFCT_ROM_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the procedure has an impact on the DRG's Risk of Mortality.

columns.name: PX_EXCLD_RPT_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the procedure was marked to be excluded from clinical reporting.

columns.name: PX_AFCT_SOI_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the procedure has an impact on the DRG's Serverity of Illness.

columns.name: AFFECTS_DRG_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the procedure has an impact on the DRG.

columns.name: INTERVENTION_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The intervention type for the ICD procedure.
